## World.getStats() method

获取World统计信息

**Signature:**

```typescript
getStats(): {
        totalEntities: number;
        totalSystems: number;
        memoryUsage: number;
        performance: {
            averageUpdateTime: number;
            maxUpdateTime: number;
        };
    };
```
**Returns:**

{ totalEntities: number; totalSystems: number; memoryUsage: number; performance: { averageUpdateTime: number; maxUpdateTime: number; }; }
